Html:
There has been no updates or forum replies in a while.

Is this project still alive

I have not been able to give it much attention in a while. The project is not dead but if people are interested in this library some help would be welcome in maintaining it. (bug fixes. porting to Silverlight 4.. Framework 4 etc..)

Currently working on a revamp of the transformators that yield beter exception handling and improved performance. Progress is slow though because I'm quite involved with some 'real live' projects.

Thomas
